WorkItem.Description: Wsus API systematically throws ArgumentNullException when trying to publish a detectoid.

Comments.Message:
So it is possible to use the Dell Server Catalog in a not so distant future? ;)

Regards
Norbert

Yes, but with some limitation due to the lake of support for Detectoids in the Wsus API.

* For now, it is impossible to know if the publication of a detectoid has been successful or has failed (in fact the Wsus API always throw an exception even if the publication has succeeds !)
* When a detectoid has been publish, you can't see it neither in WPP nor in the Wsus console.
* You can't determine whether or not a detectoid has already been published.

I have sent to Winfried and you a beta release of WPP with Detectoids support. Tell me what you think about it.
